s.text: As a test of the validity of the proportional hazards assumption (that the hazard ratio does not change over time), the Cox proportional hazards regression was performed with a variable calculated as the mean deviated natural log of time.

As a test of the validity of the proportional hazards assumption (that the hazard ratio does not change over time), the Cox proportional hazards regression was performed with a variable calculated as the mean deviated natural log of time.
In Hawaii, the passage of time has brought general improvements in medical care and also narrowed disparities in access to medical care.

Biological theories suggest that members of certain ethnic groups are genetically predisposed to more aggressive forms of the disease, differ in host-tumor interactions, or are more likely to have contributing comorbid conditions.
A small beneficial effect was observed for women when considering death due to colorectal cancer, but a strong effect when considering death due to other causes.
Another is that doctors see prognostic signs of severe disease that are not measured by our covariates, and therefore prescribe more treatment.
